text: Badru Hafidh is a Tanzanian professional football manager. Until 1998Burundi v Tanzania, 02 August 1998 - 11v11 match report and from September 2003Badru named Tanzania coach - BBC News. September 24, 2003 to July 2006 he coached the Tanzania national football team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Tanzanian football managers Category:Tanzania national football team managers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
